positions.title: Postdoctoral Fellows
positions.subtitle: Computational Chemistry, Computational Biology, Computer Science, etc.
responsibilities: Lead and conduct independent research projects as core team members in the following aspects: MD simulations for biomolecules; Deep learning model design for biological structures; Distributed simulation system design, development and acceleration
Assist in supervising students and technical staff
qualifications: PhD degree required. Candidates with backgrounds in Computational Chemistry, Computational Biology, Biomolecular Dynamics Simulation, Quantum Simulation, Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related interdisciplinary fields are preferred.
Publication record as a first author in high-impact journals or top-tier computer science conferences; strong English reading, writing, and communication skills.
Ability to conduct independent research; proficiency in programming (e.g., C++ or Python) and deep learning model development (e.g., PyTorch).

Priority consideration for candidates familiar with: Biomolecular dynamics simulation (e.g., Amber, Gromacs); Quantum simulation (e.g., ORCA, Gaussian); Density Functional Theory (DFT); Extensive experience in deep learning research
Strong belief in the impact of AI on biological research; rigorous work ethic, strong self-motivation, collaborative spirit, and academic integrity.
benefits: Standard postdoctoral benefits of Tsinghua University and the State. Support for applying to various funding programs.
Candidates may also apply to become lecturers at the School of Life Sciences through the 'Excellence in Teaching' program.
A collaborative research environment using state-of-the-art methods, with opportunities to work on cross-sector collaborations.

requiredMaterials: Personal CV (including publication list, educational background, research experience, honors and awards)
Contact information for at least three references

positions.title: PhD Students
positions.subtitle: Computational Biology, Bioinformatics, etc.
responsibilities: The research group is recruiting students pursuing a direct-entry PhD degree program.
qualifications: The research group will participate in the 2026 Biomedical Sciences PhD program admissions.
The lab currently supervises students jointly with Prof. Bo Shao from Microsoft Research and Prof. Jianzhu Ma.
benefits: Standard PhD student benefits of Tsinghua University
Additional stipend support from the research group

positions.title: Research Assistants
positions.subtitle: Software Development, Research Support
responsibilities: Develop and maintain research software infrastructure
Manage and process large-scale simulation data
Maintain GPU clusters and HPC systems
qualifications: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related fields
Proficiency in Python, C++, and Linux systems
Experience with HPC and GPU computing is a plus
benefits: Competitive salary based on qualifications and experience
Standard benefits of Tsinghua University staff

requiredMaterials: Brief description of technical skills and experience

positions.title: Interns
positions.subtitle: Research Internship Opportunities
responsibilities: Participate in ongoing research projects under supervision
Conduct literature reviews and data analysis
qualifications: Current undergraduate or graduate students in relevant fields
Minimum commitment of 3 months, 20+ hours per week
benefits: Hands-on research experience in cutting-edge AI for biology
